[ Kings of Horizo??ns - 地平线 ]
 作者原文：
I welcome you to the middle-ground that for centuries has been under siege by foreign empire and three kingdoms, a place of constant warfare, a place of glory, dishonor, and blood. Bring out your swords, count the arrows, and sharpen your axes – you shall find here only war. We, the bloodied veterans, welcome you at the Kings of Horizons!
Main Informations

The project is made by a small but very determined team. Recently a year has passed since the first update, but this was just the beginning. Here you will find basic information about the project.

Main Creators:
- Main Developer: MalcomPL 
- Classes&Teams: RaTmAnPL 
- Main Assistant: BarnoXp

And others (Special Thanks):- FastrekPL - TurkHacker - Longer - Skrzatek - Syriusz98

Works on 1.13.2 Minecraft version: 
- Multiplayer
- Singleplayer (Lan mod)
- Download OptiFine 1.13.2 to get Texture-Pack work properly.Welcome, PvP fans!

Are you looking for a map where do you fight battles with even a 60 players? You are looking for a map and what can you test your fighting skills? Or you just wans to stand face to face with your friend and determine who is better and who is gonna take the island for his faction? You've found something something perfect for you. In the world of Kings of Horizons you will find unique classes, engaging mechanics, different factions, economics on the battlefield and more.
There is just everything here to please any PvP fan!What is Kings of Horizons project?

Kings of Horizons takes players to a whole new level of PvP battles in Minecraft. It's a fully automated Faction vs Faction PvP map that lets you take up arms as one of 13 totally different classes under a banner of one from four different factions and fight matches on medieval-esque maps. Dominate entire islands, upgrade classes, use your best skills. Adjust the game style to the class and become undefined!
Main features: 


- 13 classes with different skills, weapons, armor, and other bonuses. 
- About 120 class combinations. - A lot of interesting mechanics 
- Completely different sides of the conflict. - Very climatic maps (4 for now): 

- "Split Point" 
- "Shrine Island" 
- "Sun Fortress" 
- "Windress Cave" 

- Dynamic gameplay 
- Continuous updates 
- Possibility to customize the game 
- It supports up to 60 Players (Split in 15 among 4 Factions) 
- Downloaded map is in the English language version
lasses, factions, houses...!

On the map you will discover very diverse classes, each of them has its own unique skills, weapons, armor and other features! Little? You also have the option of selecting one of four completely different factions, and each is divided into three houses. This gives you a total of 120class combinations. If you add that you can upgrade your class on the battlefield, you will gain lot of ** in selecting your own play style.
Here, every PvP fan will find something for himself! Tell your friends about this map if you like it, because it isn't made to play alone!







译文：
欢迎你到地平线，几个世纪以来这里的国家一直不断发起战争的，这里一个荣耀，耻辱和血腥的地方。让我们拿起刀剑神域XD，出发把（魔改原文可还行） - 你在这里只会发现撕逼。我们这些血腥的退伍军人欢迎你来到地平线
主要信息

该项目由一个规模炒鸡小但非常NB的团队组成。自最初更新以来已经过去了一年，但这只是一个开始。在这里，你将可以找到有关该项目的基本信息。

主要创作者：
- 主要开发者：MalcomPL
- 主要团队：RaTmAnPL 
- 主要助手：BarnoXp

和其他人（特别鸣谢）：
- FastrekPL
- TurkHacker
- Longer
- Skrzatek
- Syriusz98

适用于1.13.2 Minecraft版本：
- 单人撕逼- 多人一起撕逼
（Lan mod）
- 下载OptiFine 1.13.2以使Texture-Pack正常工作。欢迎，PvP粉丝！

可能你正在寻找一张地图，可以跟60名玩家进行撕逼的地图。可能你正在寻找一张地图，可以测试你的撕逼技巧的地图，或者与你的朋友面对面打架，并确定谁会更加NB，谁将带他的队伍走向胜利？你找到了适合自己的技巧。在地平线世界，你会发现让你意想不到的课程，引人入胜的装备，不同的队伍等等。
这里有一切可以取悦任何PvP粉丝！
什么是国王的地平线项目？

Kings of Horizons让玩家在Minecraft中获得全新的PvP撕逼战斗。这是一个完全自动的 国家 vs 国家 PvP 地图，它可以让你在四个不同阵营中的一个岛屿上占据13个完全不同的类别之一，并在中世纪风格的地图上进行比赛。统治整个岛屿，升级课程，使用你的最NB技能。将游戏风格调整到让对方队伍并变得被动且猥琐在家。
主要特点：
- 13 个具有不同技能，武器，护甲和其他奖励的课程。
- 大约120个技能组合。（我叶秋不服，为什么他也有120技能）
- 许多very funny的机制（皮一手很舒适）
- 完全不同的撕逼，让你无法自拔。- 有不正常气候的地图（现在4个）：

- “分裂岛屿” 
- “神社岛屿” 
- “太阳系大堡垒”
- “风洞”

- 动态游戏 
- 持续更新 
- 可自定义游戏 
- 它支持多达60个玩家（在4个队伍中分成15个） 
- 下载的地图采用英语版本
技能，队伍，基地......！

在地图上，你将发现非常多且让你懵逼的课程，每个课程都有NB的技能，武器，盔甲和不知名的东西！你还可以选择四个完全不同的队伍中的一个，每个队伍有三个基地。这为你提供了120种技能组合。如果你补充一点，你可以在战场升级你的职业技能，让你获得你自己喜欢的游戏风格。
在这里，每个PvP粉丝、大佬都会为自己喜欢的撕逼！如果你喜欢，请告诉你的朋友这个地图，因为它不是单独玩的！

 [ Install - 地图安装 ]
Save存档(正版用户):
1、关闭Minecraft，
2、在Windows资源管理器的路径中输入 %appdata%/.minecraft 。
3、把下载的地图存档解压缩放到. minecraft\saves 文件夹里面。

Schematics存档：
这类型需要MCEdit。
1、下载完成后解压，
2、关闭Minecraft，
3、打开MCEdit.exe，点击下方import按钮，选择你下载的文件，
     最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。

- 本地图请使用第一种"Save存档(正版用户)"方法安装使用 -
